<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Mana Wastes Refugee](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=90)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Impossible Lands

</column>

Exposure to the corrupting influence of the Mana Wastes’ strange energies has warped your inner essence, resulting in unpredictable interactions with magic items and more than a little know-how about surviving under bizarre and adverse natural conditions.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) skill, and the [Wilderness Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Trick Magic Item](/Feats.aspx?ID=857) skill feat.
